AlchemyBag.NAME: Alchemy Bag
AlchemyBag.FLAVOR: A mysterious bag with the power of recurring potions.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, obtain a lesser potion to the Sack.

MiracleBag.NAME: Miracle Bag
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, obtain a random potion.
Replaces #yAlchemy #yBag. At the start of each combat, obtain a rare potion.

ColorfulStone.NAME: Colorful Stone
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pick up, #b3 of your Defends change their color. They count as #yunique and give #b1 more #yBlock.
